content.text: 0) Cream together butter, peanut butter and sugars.
2) In a separate bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "sift"@23:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "flour"@37:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "baking powder"@44:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "baking soda"@59:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "salt"@76:80 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a separate bowl"@6:21 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Put batter in refrigerator for 1 hour.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Put"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "batter"@7:13 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "refrigerator"@17:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "1 hour"@34:40 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Roll into 1 inch balls and put on baking sheets.
6) Flatten each ball with a fork, making a criss-cross pattern.
7) Bake in a preheated 375 degrees F oven for about 10 minutes or until cookies begin to brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "a preheated 375 degrees F oven"@11:41 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "about 10 minutes"@46:62 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until cookies begin to brown"@66:94 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
